kDesc
A blue leotard with brown tights down to the feet. [#Legal]
Body bleu et collants marrons couvrants jusqu’aux orteils. [#Legal]
Blauer Gymnastikanzug und braune Stockings, die auch die Zehenspitzen umfassen.[#Legal]
Body blu e collant marroni che coprono tutto il piede.[#Legal]
Leotardo azul y medias marrones que cubren hasta los pies.[#Legal]
青いレオタードと、足先まで覆うブラウンのタイツ。[#Legal]
파란색 레오타드와 발끝까지 덮는 갈색 타이츠. [#Legal]
A blue leotard with brown tights down to the feet. [#Legal]
藍色緊身衣和長至腳底的啡色緊身褲。[#Legal]
藍色緊身衣和長至腳底的褐色緊身褲。[#Legal]
A blue leotard and brown tights covering down to the toes.[#Legal]
